#include <bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std;
 
#define MAXN 111
#define MOD 1000000007
#define LL long long int
 
LL dp[MAXN][MAXN] = {0};
LL n, m, p, i, j;
 
inline void Solve(){
cin>>n>>m>>p;
memset(dp, 0, sizeof dp);
dp[0][0] = 1;
for(int i=0;i<p;i++)
{
for(int j=0;j <= n;j++)
{
if(j>=m)
{
dp[i+1][j] += dp[i][j] * (j - m);
dp[i + 1][j] %= MOD;
dp[i+1][j+1] += dp[i][j] * (n - j);
dp[i + 1][j + 1] %= MOD;
}
else{
dp[i+1][j+1] += dp[i][j] * (n - j);
dp[i + 1][j + 1] %= MOD;
}
}
}
cout<<dp[p][n]<<endl;
}
 
int main()
{
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--){
Solve();
}
return 0;
}
